mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorites (user_id, botanic_id, folder_no, folder_name, image_path) VALUES (#{userId}, #{botanicId}, #{folderNo}, #{folderName}, #{imagePath})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorites WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND botanic_id = #{botanicId}
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.botanic_id, f.folder_no, f.folder_name, f.image_path, f.created_at, b.botanic_name FROM favorites f JOIN botanicals b ON f.botanic_id = b.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
